lead_paragraph: As an unprecedented midterm campaign finally comes to a close, here's a preview of the features and offerings the Times will have throughout the day and into the night to track  the elections nationwide that will determine the control of Congress:
snippet: Live video, iPad-friendly coverage and map results for Web and mobile browsers, starting around 6 p.m.
abstract: Live video, iPad-friendly coverage and map results for Web and mobile browsers, starting around 6 p.m.
